h2_title: Yellow-Robed Squire Boss Fight and Guide
content: One of his main combos will begin with another “pocket sand” attack, followed by two quick swipes from his extended claws, and then a delayed jump attack to finish the combo, which can send up tremors from where he impacts.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow-Robed_Squire.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow-Robed Squire', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow-Robed Squire Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
One of his main combos will begin with another “pocket sand” attack, followed by two quick swipes from his extended claws, and then a delayed jump attack to finish the combo, which can send up tremors from where he impacts.
